body:
Alpana,


Unfortunately, Radiance isn't the kind of program that you run by clicking
the icon. Everything is done via the terminal and/or with scripting.
The tutorials under the learn tab should help you get started:
http://www.radiance-online.org/learning/tutorials


Best,
Andy
